meanings.definition: The act of adding excessive decorations or details to something.
meanings.sent1: Her overembellishment of the cake with too many frosting flowers made it look messy.
meanings.sent2: The overembellishment of the costume with sequins and feathers made it stand out on stage.
meanings.sent3: The overembellishment of the story with made-up characters made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His overembellishment of the fishing tale with giant sea monsters amazed the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The overembellishment of the painting with vibrant colors made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Exaggerating or embellishing something to an excessive degree.
meanings.sent1: The overembellishment description of the movie as the best ever was not accurate.
meanings.sent2: Her overembellishment praise of the dish as the most delicious was not convincing.
meanings.sent3: The overembellishment excitement over the new toy was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: His overembellishment enthusiasm for the game was like a firework in the room.
meanings.sent5: The overembellishment joy in her eyes was contagious to everyone around.
